com.team08storyapp

Class ESHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.ESHelper

  • public class ESHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    ESHelper is a helper class that helps the application communicate with a webservice. The webservice is may allow posting, listing, deleting and searching stories.

    For the purpose of this application, this class allows the following communications with the webservice:

    • Adding a local story to the webservice.
    • Getting a specific story stored on the webservice using a provided ID.
    • Getting all stories stored from the webservice.
    • Updating a specific story stored on the webservice using a provided ID.
    • Searching the webservice for all stories that contain a provided text string within either it's author and/or title.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Abram Hindle and Chenlei Zhang (@link https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo), Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdateOnlineStory

        public int addOrUpdateOnlineStory(Story story)
        Adds or updates a story on the webservice. The method checks the Story object passed in to see if it contains a onlineStoryId. If it does not it finds the next possible Id to assigned to it and then adds the Story to the webservice with that Id. If the Story object contains an onlineStoryId then it calls the webservice with that Id and the story object, updating the Story that was located at that Id.
        Parameters:
        story - The Story that is being added or updated to the webservice.
        Returns:
        The onlineStoryId of the Story that was added or updated.
        See Also:
        Story

      • getOnlineStory

        public Story getOnlineStory(int storyId)
        Returns a Story object for a specific onlineStoryId contained on the webservice. This Story object can be used to display a "Chose Your Own Adventure story".

        The method uses ElisticSearch (@link http://www.elasticsearch.org/guide/) to retrieve the story from the webservice.

        Parameters:
        storyId - The onlineStoryId of the Story to retrieve from the webservice.
        Returns:
        The Story object for a specified onlineStoryId.
        See Also:
        Story

      • getOnlineStories

        public java.util.ArrayList<Story> getOnlineStories()
        Returns a list of all Story objects contained on the webservice. These stories can be used to display a list of all possible stories to view online.
        Returns:
        The List of Stories from the webservice.
        See Also:
        Story

      • searchOnlineStories

        public java.util.ArrayList<Story> searchOnlineStories(java.lang.String searchString)
        Returns a list of stories from the webservice that contain the searched text in either their Author or Title fields.

        The method uses ElisticSearch (@link http://www.elasticsearch.org/guide/) to retrieve the story from the webservice.

        Parameters:
        searchString - A text string containing the key set of words to use in searching the webservices Stories.
        Returns:
        A list of stories that contain the text used in the search in either their Author or Title fields.
